donor_name: UNITED NATIONS DEVELOPMENT FUND FOR WOME
GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS
outputs.output_descr:
The project is for the implementation of the Global Fund Round 7 Malaria Control Grant (LBR- 708-G06-T).  Following are the objectives defined for this current TB Grant:
(i) To increase access to high quality DOTS targetting 70% NSP case detection, (ii)To establish the management of MDR-TB cases, (iii) To expand effective TB/HIV collaborating mechanish, (iv)To empower the community and people living with TB, (v)To strengthen the Health System, (vi) To undertake ARI survey by end 2008.

project_title: Tuberculosis Control & Managbement of People with TB/HIV
